Name: HardCop 2
About the game: VR Action Game for Valve Index. And Hey, its not a Wave Shooter! About 20min to 40min long, self contained Adventure of oldscool Action. Free locomotion with zero assist (thats a feature). All the Reloading you would want in a VR game. Pumpgun is reloaded through rotation like in T2. The demo Version is the same as the paid Version, so play that, and if you had fun consider supporting me with the paid Version. special thanks to E and Coco!
